ch.htwchur.coltero.dashboard.logic.extraction

Class HtmlContentExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.htwchur.coltero.dashboard.logic.extraction.HtmlContentExtractor

  • public class HtmlContentExtractor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class extracts and processes body content of pages while it removes HTML tags
    Author:
    sandro.hoerler@htwchur.ch
